description:
BRANDY BARACCAT Eau de Parfum - An Exquisite Luxury Oriental Fragrance

Discover the captivating allure of BRANDY BARACCAT 100 ML EDP, a masterfully crafted oriental perfume that embodies sophistication and timeless elegance. This premium fragrance creates an unforgettable sensory experience with its rich blend of exotic notes and luxurious accords. âœ¨

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100 ML Unisex Eau de Parfum High BRANDY BARACCAT

Fragrance Profile: A Symphony of Exotic Notes

Top Notes Bergamot, Saffron, Black Pepper
Heart Notes Rose, Oud, Amber
Base Notes Vanilla, Musk, Patchouli, Sandalwood

BRANDY BARACCAT emerged as a best-selling fragrance from a house dedicated to creating exceptional luxury perfumes. The brand draws inspiration from ancient perfumery traditions while incorporating modern techniques to create truly distinctive scents. This particular creation has garnered acclaim for its sophisticated blend of traditional amber and oud notes with contemporary accents.

The Oriental Fragrance Experience

When you wear BRANDY BARACCAT, you're enveloped in a warm embrace of spicy saffron and black pepper that gradually reveals a heart of luxurious rose and oud. The dry down unfolds into a rich base of vanilla, musk, and sandalwood that lingers magnificently. Perfect for those who appreciate new and distinctive fragrances with character and depth. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

How long does BRANDY BARACCAT EDP last on skin?
BRANDY BARACCAT offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The high-quality ingredients and EDP concentration ensure that the fragrance develops beautifully throughout the day, with the rich base notes of vanilla, musk, and sandalwood creating a lasting impression that may remain detectable even after 12+ hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and well-moisturized skin.
short_description: An opulent oriental fragrance that blends precious saffron, rose, and oud with rich vanilla and sandalwood. BRANDY BARACCAT EDP delivers exceptional longevity and projection, creating an aura of sophistication and luxury that captivates the senses.
